content.prompt: The disparity of GDP among states and the income inequality reflected in the map imply which of the following?

choices.label: Foreign direct investment in eastern Nigeria has been negatively affected.
Mistrust and tension have arisen among various ethnic groups.
Nigerians have emigrated in large numbers to neighboring countries.
Corruption among state officials has declined at the local level.
